Metadata.Title: CVE-2026-22701 affecting package python-filelock for versions less than 3.20.3-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2026-22701 affecting package python-filelock for versions less than 3.20.3-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-filelock is earlier than 3.20.3-1, affected by CVE-2026-22701
